css2json.py
===========

Convert style sheets to json. Python clone of kesla/css2json

Install
~~~~~~~

``pip install css2json``

Usage
~~~~~

::

    >>> import css2json
    >>> css2json.css2json("""
    ... p {
    ...     color: #222;
    ...     margin: 10px;
    ... }
    ... """)
    '{"p": {"color": "#222", "margin": "10px"}}'
    >>>
